title: Software Developer - Portfolio of López Leandro
about_text: I am a software developer specialized in backend, with experience in frontend and mobile applications. I enjoy creating complete solutions that combine logic, databases, and clear, intuitive user experiences. I work with technologies such as Python, Node.js, SQL, JavaScript, PHP, Flutter, and technical documentation tools, applying best practices in development and team collaboration. My goal is to continue building solutions that deliver real value and improve people's experiences.
